              uk.ac.ebi.mdk.apps.CommandLineMain

Direct Known Subclasses:
Align, Align2Reference, CheckSubstructures, ChemicalNameSearch, FindMismatches, SBMLConverter, SubliminalTSV2SDF, SummariseReferences
public abstract class CommandLineMain
extends ArrayList<org.apache.commons.cli.Option>

CommandLineMain.java – EMBL-EBI – MetabolicDevelopmentKit – Jun 1, 2011 Abstract object for when a main is runnable on the common line. The object effectively provides a wrapper for command option processing utilising the Apache Commons CLI library

Author:
johnmay
